column7: dog-friendly home with private hot tub, ocean/meadow views & shared pools
column11: There were a few issues, from the tv in the room with the single queen bed not working, and a couple of the burners on the cooktop not functioning properly (which could be hazardous).
column13: We had a great stay, catching up with friends I haven't spent time with in a long time. The place was plenty big (but the listing pictures made everything look much larger), and the kitchen was well-appointed. There were a few issues, from the tv in the room with the single queen bed not working, and a couple of the burners on the cooktop not functioning properly (which could be hazardous). It was great to get away, and I appreciated the early check in, and the ability to purchase a late check out!

column7: dog-friendly home near beach with wifi, central ac, private w/d, & deck
column11: From a licensed electrician view (I am a 32 years Master licensed electrician)If the main breaker is tripping then you have a fire hazard.
column13: This place was in a great location beautiful home and it was quiet clean to some standards but not to mine. There was blood stain on master bed pillow case. The shower was rinsed out not cleaned like should be. Windex works great on mirrors and all surfaces clean the mirrors and pictures. Should clean with HOT Water not cold nor slightly warm. The hot water heater must had been turned on 70 degrees because we never had hot water. The worst part was when the main breaker tripped and water heater breaker was the only one tripped with it. From a licensed electrician view (I am a 32 years Master licensed electrician)If the main breaker is tripping then you have a fire hazard. I hope they get this fixed immediately. Through all this issue they offered us some very cheap condo instead and not another house. So we had to stay the 2nd night in the house again afraid to sleep or run the heater or anything that may cause an electrical fire. This was January so it got down in the 30's at night. Cold house cold shower sucked. We came here for my daughters bday weekend to celebrate her bday and all our plans were ruined Saturday waiting on maintenance man to arrive (who agreed with me and said he had been telling them to get an electrician out there in the past) andfor the agency to call me to see if they were going to place us in a different home. My daughters bday weekend was ruined. Thank god the things I had planned refunded us most of our money back. I just think this place should do the same. I felt overcharged in the beginning due to being off season and it was only 2 nights. I want a complete refund let's see if they will do the right thing. Still debating if I should do my licensed duty by calling the fire marshal on you which would cost you in major fines if not shut you down completely to do a complete investigation on a your properties. Especially when you break the law and allow is to stay here when you already knew about the main breaker tripping issue and the water heater issue. I want a refund.

column7: moraira charming villa 5 min from the sea 4/6 pers
column11: Same cupboards, fridge, well used and grubby utensils and utensils' box, rusty dangerous kettle (the steam pours out of the on/off switch where your hand goes.) and a filthy waste bin area.
column13:
The villa is in a very quiet residential neighbourhood with partial sea views. It is freshly painted, has a nice driveway and an attractive garden. Inside is a different story to the extent we have lodged an official complaint with VRBO.
We booked the villa a year in advance of our stay of 3 weeks in January 2023 on the basis of - to quote from the villa’s site - “completely renovated (end of works April 2019) and “a completely new kitchen and very well equipped.” These statements are totally untrue.
The kitchen is the same kitchen that was there in January 2014, some 9 years ago! Same cupboards, fridge, well used and grubby utensils and utensils’ box, rusty dangerous kettle (the steam pours out of the on/off switch where your hand goes.) and a filthy waste bin area. Random grubby and useless items were in the kitchen drawers. The gas hob had one non functioning and alarming ring which we had to avoid.
We have supplied VRBO with photographic evidence of all these comments.
The site quotes “sheets, linen and towels are hotel quality”. This was not the case - bed linen was thin and of poor quality and we were expected to have the same sheets throughout our 3 week stay as no clean ones were provided until we insisted the cleaner came and unlocked the cupboard the sheets were locked in.
No information/instruction folder was to be found on arrival which is essential when trying to settle in to a new home.

column7: waterfront 2-bedrooms 2.5 b condo free parking
column10: misleading description of beds and filthy dirty carpet and fans!
column11: the stove and microwave were either really dirty of damaged
column13: I booked and paid for a two bed, two and a half bath condo for 4 adults, one couple and two other adults, so we needed 3 beds. The third bed listed in the description of the property a sofa sleeper/futon bed which I planned for my adult children to take turns sleeping on. We arrived at the property at 1AM on Sunday morning. Imagine my surprise and disappointment when the couch and chair in the living room were neither sleeper sofas nor futons and were not big enough for a 10 year old child to sleep on much less a full grown adult! I found a phone number for the host and texted him asking if we had been given the wrong condo as I was very specific with him prior to our trip that we needed a third bed. He never once said that the 3rd bed was an air mattress that needed to be blown up after we arrived, but this is what he texted me in the wee hours of the morning after we arrived! I could not even find the mattress until the next morning as the closet where it was stored was in a bedroom where my son had already gone to bed. I found the mattress the next morning and when I blew it up the air rushed out through a giant hole in the seam! I called the host and he insisted that it was standard that the 3rd bed was an air bed...never disclosed on VRBO, much less expected when you are booking a vacation property as opposed to an Air B and B. Later that day he had Instacart drop off a new bed. The new bed needed batteries in order to use the pump provided with the bed, however the batteries were not included...stated right on the front of the box..batteries not included! Meanwhile, I filed a complaint with VRBO about the bait and switch in the property description. They finally agreed to rebook us in a different property, but only if the host cancelled our current booking! I went back and forth via text with the host insisting he cancel our booking and he refuseed. I requested he at least refund the cleaning and service fees and he still refused. He then started referring to the fourth person in our party as an "extra guest". I booked and paid for 4 adults and specifically requested accommodation with 3 beds. I was never once told the third bed would be an old air mattress with a giant hole in it! The carpet throughout the unit is filthy dirty, the ceiling fans were filthy dirty , the stove and microwave were either really dirty of damaged, there was a giant smear of greas on the cabinet over the microwave. There were holes in walls and dents in doors

column7: super affordable rates on oceanfront comfort at el faro! - reef 204
column11: Glass range cooktop was significantly damaged with very large cracks in the surface (a small, portable electric burner was provided).
column13:
Pros - nice infinity swimming pool, close to the beach, great views of the beach & sea, many bars/restaurants to choose from in the downtown core

Cons - Arrived Saturday night, had great difficulty finding a driving route to the property, as many roads in the area were closed off (which is a nightly occurrence). It would’ve been nice to have known this beforehand, and given driving instructions to bypass the numerous road closures. Very noisy locale, given the many bars and in the area - music was blaring till 2 AM every night. The room suite itself was OK, but dated. Barbeque was rusted and ancient. Glass range cooktop was significantly damaged with very large cracks in the surface (a small, portable electric burner was provided). The built-in microwave was also not working (a small, portable microwave was also provided). As is common with other resorts and condominium properties, finding a poolside lounge chair can be daunting if you’re not up early and reserving one for yourself (even though you are instructed not to reserve a chair and leave it for an hour or more, nobody follows that rule…and on-site security doesn’t enforce it).

column7: grandmas house with a view!
column11: This home presents a huge fire hazard with all the electrical issues.
column13: Upon arriving, we found a note from the host that the furnace had quit working the day before our arrival. And the home was quite cold. When contacting the host was told I was exaggerating that the house was freezing on arrival, that it had to be at least 60 degrees downstairs & 70 upstairs. It was not near that. There was almost 10 space heaters plugged in throughout the home. And we had to also start the fire place and get the fire going with the wet wood they had. Due to all of the space heaters plugged in, it also blew a breaker. We found the breaker box, in the living room wall, covered with a piece of styrofoam and cloth as the breaker cover. The other breaker box had no cover. Several outlets & light switches were without covers. The outlets all had power strips or outlet extenders plugged into them. The downstairs had no smoke alarm and the barrel fire place down there got extremely hot. The ceiling tiles had been wet throughout and starting to fall in. The pictures are deceiving. This home presents a huge fire hazard with all the electrical issues.

column13: We really enjoyed the condo. Two concerns. The cold water in the kitchen sink doesn’t work at all. No water comes out. The electrical outlet in the downstairs bathroom is loose and fell out of the wall.

column7: charming home away from home! steps from the ocean - enjoy bella breeze!
column10: it was a disaster! fire hazard
column11: The electrical system is definitely a fire hazard!
column13: Where to begin? When we first arrived in our room the things waiting for us to find were so upsetting that we would not recommend this rental. When we first arrived, I immediately notice how filthy the floor was, there was not even a smell of cleaning products to indicate it had been cleaned after the previous guests. The floor was filthy, and we ended up cleaning it ourselves. We rented this place for a two week stay. The condition of the rooms and its appliances were deplorable! The wash rags where stained black from obvious use as cleaning rags. We had to consistently ask for hand towels and wash clothes because there were not any, or they were dirty. Every touchable wall and molding were covered with grime and dirt build up. The room had constant proof of lack of upkeep and not being cleaned between guests. The windowsills had visible round rust spots and jagged edges. Several pieces of furniture had questionable white gunky substances that words couldn't describe what it even was. The sofas had spots on them of a questionable nature. One of the bar chairs were broken which wasn't noticed until we sat in the chair. The dishwasher, the first time we opened it had a mold smell and evidence of old washed food particles not removed at any point recently. The first time actually running the dishwasher had raw sewage back up into the food disposal. We requested that a plumber be sent out to fix it and the leaking washing machine that every time it ran leaked water on the floor that we were forced to clean up ourselves. The plumber said he could not fix the disposal and that it needed to be replaced, which was not installed while we were there. The electrician and plumber had been there on several occasions during our stay for one problem or another and we had to stay there when they would come out. Ruining our vacation! We stayed in constant contact with Robin addressing these issues, but it gets worse from here. The electric outlets in the kitchen were popping sparks and led to us having to plug the coffee maker and the toaster oven in the den on the floor. The dryer was so loud and not to mention dirty inside that you couldn't even hear a person talking. We did not have hot water in the shower or the sink in the kitchen for the duration of our stay. The pictures showing this rental are not what you will receive if you book here. We ended up having to move out on the seventh day because of so many electrical and plumbing issues with no quick resolve to be seen. We ended up having to book a more expensive place because this condo was not livable, nor having to constantly spend our afternoons waiting on service repairs. Renter beware this place truly needs to be gutted. All of the appliances are in disrepair. I am not sure who wrote the other three reviews, but they did not stay in this condo. It is a fire hazard and I really feel this is the most concerning of all the issues. The electrical system is definitely a fire hazard! To the point we could not sleep being concerned about it catching on fire. The list of things wrong with this condo are very long. No one should stay here.

column7: luxurious villa, stunning gardens, sea view, separate annex, equestrian area
column10: not what we were hoping for
column11: This property overall was a bit of a disappointment because we were told that the original house we had booked had water or electricity damage so we had chose another.
column13: This property overall was a bit of a disappointment because we were told that the original house we had booked had water or electricity damage so we had chose another. This house is very eccentric indeed and quite outdated which made it feel quite dusty and grimy. We will not be dealing with Algarve Vacations in future. It was ridiculous that we had to pay extra to use a baby cot and high chair (after we were made to change houses!). In addition, 130 euros of our deposit was not returned for some coffee stains on sheets that apparently wouldn't come out in the wash. We have no way of knowing if they tried and no way of disputing it to try to get the money back.

column7: cozy 1-bedroom apartment in the historical center of copenhagen close to tivoli
column11: Der Fernseher funktionierte nicht.
column13: Die Lage ist perfekt. Allerdings muss man wissen, dass die Wohnung im Hinterhof liegt, sonst versucht man, wie wir, im Vorderhaus reguläre Mieter aus der Wohnung zu verscheuchen. Wenn man am Leben der Anderen interessiert ist, kommt man von allen Seiten lautstark voll auf seine Kosten. Die Heizung im Schlafzimmer funktioniert nicht. Dafür aber der bereitgestellte Heizlüfter, für den es keine Anleitung gibt. So war es entweder bullig warm oder bullig warm. Nackt schlafen im Winter...? Warum nicht?! Das Sofa im Wohnzimmer vollkommen zerstört, zerfetzt und durchgesessen. Der Fernseher funktionierte nicht. Im Bad roch es ein bisschen unangenehm aus dem Abfluss und der Fön war kaputt. Im Schlafzimmer war der Kabelanschluss für die Deckenlampe mit Kreppklebeband fixiert. Vermutlich dänisches Design. Das Bett war absolut durchgelegen, aber man konnte erstaunlich gut darin schlafen. Das klingt in der Summe bestimmt eher negativ, aber da wir ständig unterwegs waren, fiel das alles nicht ins Gewicht. Nochmal jedoch sicher nicht.

column7: great location, spectacular oceanfront condo, newly reduced fall/winter  rates!
column10: amazing ocean-front view from spacious balcony
column11: Microwave control buttons for lights/fan were loose and hard to operate.
column13:
This is an older condo with older furniture and amenities but nicely kept. We enjoyed our 10 day stay. Fish Market across the street with fresh caught fish daily. Food truck court just down the street was fun. Other small eateries and coffee shops within walking distance. Grass area with beach chairs/lounges with the waves pounding the wall in front of you. The unit's location to beachfront is hard to beat.
However, here are some observations about the condo. 
The photographer did an amazing job of making the unit look twice the size it actually is. 
Balcony and living areas are comfortable and spacious compared to the rest of the unit.
Bathroom area with shower is small but adequate for two people, not more. 
Kitchen is very small but has a full size range and microwave. No oven, but we didn't go there to make Thanksgiving dinner! Small toaster oven is provided but would not fit even a small pizza. Cooking utensils were minimal. Not many drinking glasses, especially plastic ones for the beach.
Bedroom featured a king-size captain's bed that filled the room. If you are shorter than 6 feet tall or have trouble climbing and jumping you might have trouble getting into the bed. My wife is 5 feet tall and I had to pull her into bed each night. It is comfortable once you are in it, but hard to get into. Very little room to move around the bed. We had to move a couple of items out of the room to make it easier to get around the bed. Closet is adequate size with hangers and shelves, and the captain's bed has large drawers that pull out for storing items, but they are hard to access because of how close the bed is to the walls.
Laundry facilities were easy to use and located on all levels except the first level.
Getting to the small beach in front of the break wall was difficult due to damaged stairways on both ends of the property. The damage, likely from storms, is bad enough that the stairs are fenced off. Access to the beach is by climbing down the 4-5 foot wall made of lava rock, not something everyone will be able to do. A short walk north along the street takes you to a nice public access beach where you can spend the day or just walk back through the tidepools to the front of the Paki Maui property.
Pool area was nicely outfitted with gas grills. Spa was warm and comfortable. Pool is not heated so it was not comfortable to be in (we visited in January) unless you are from Minnesota, in which case you would probably love it!
Several maintenance items had been overlooked and we hope they are repaired for the next visitor (all reported to property manager). Bathroom sink drained painfully slow. Kitchen faucet was wobbly and not properly attached to the counter top. Microwave control buttons for lights/fan were loose and hard to operate. Towel rack inside shower had been previously broken and poorly repaired requiring us to continually put it back in place.
Again, overall we enjoyed ou stay at Paki Maui but found the attention to detail for a property priced at this level to be lacking. Next visit we would choose a different property. We hope this helps those considering this unit.

column7: lakefront, large windows, decks, hot tub, sauna, games and more.
column11: Some finishing touches that would make it better: trash cans in all bathrooms, fix loose towel racks, put handles/knobs on all kitchen cabinets (especially under sink), paint the spots where drywall has been patched, consider some basic instructions for use of kitchen appliances, TV and gas fireplace.
column13: Stayed here for a weekend with friends. The house could use some TLC, but the picture windows, lake view, hot tub and multilevel deck more than compensated for the less-than-perfect interior. The inside is comfortable—great room upstairs was an excellent “hangout” spot and the pool and football tables downstairs were fun. It was fairly clean but did have some cobwebs in corners and dust bunnies/crumbs under beds. Some finishing touches that would make it better: trash cans in all bathrooms, fix loose towel racks, put handles/knobs on all kitchen cabinets (especially under sink), paint the spots where drywall has been patched, consider some basic instructions for use of kitchen appliances, TV and gas fireplace. But overall, we had a nice time here and there was plenty of room for 4 couples.

column7: the nest - the perfect family getaway in the heart of kiama
column10: a holiday home with potential (with more attention to maintenance).
column11: While the property itself has many good features, presents nicely and the property managers responded quickly to problems as they arose, we were confronted with a number of concerning issues which we spent valuable holiday time dealing with quite apart from the total inconvenience of the maintenance failures eg the dishwasher failed on the first usage & leaked into the downstairs (dishwasher hose & associated electrics- rodent damage), 3 beds at least did not have fresh sheets and had sand etc in them (too late at night to involve property managers), batteries to 2 fans needed replacing and fire alarm battery needed replacing after dishwasher leak.
column13: We recently rented this property for a family of 7. While the property itself has many good features, presents nicely and the property managers responded quickly to problems as they arose, we were confronted with a number of concerning issues which we spent valuable holiday time dealing with quite apart from the total inconvenience of the maintenance failures eg the dishwasher failed on the first usage & leaked into the downstairs (dishwasher hose & associated electrics- rodent damage), 3 beds at least did not have fresh sheets and had sand etc in them (too late at night to involve property managers), batteries to 2 fans needed replacing and fire alarm battery needed replacing after dishwasher leak. The one upstairs toilet had a very unpleasant & obvious smell. The downstairs ensuite accommodation (a room off the converted garage) does not have an opening window in the bedroom or a fan, the nearby kitchenette could at least provided glasses for water- it is totally empty of any utensils. Not really a pleasant alternative space for grandparents!

column7: 10%off 7 nights or more - sandy escape fraser island, kingfisher bay resort
column10: beautiful house but unclean and run down
column11: - The media/tv room on the first floor was very dirty with stains on the couch and the blinds unable to be used due to being damaged.
column13:
This was the second time we had stayed at Kingfisher Heights but in two different houses. We had high expectations based on the pictures of the house and our first stay. With the experience I have in the travel & tourism industry, I am used to reviewing properties. Unfortunately, Sandy Escape did not meet expectations. The following were the main issues:
 - The property was quite unclean with piles of dirt left in the downstairs bathroom. 
 - We advised there would be 10 adults staying but were only provided with 7 bath towels, even though information states bath towels are provided for all guests. 
 - Only 2 burners on the 6 burner stove work. 
 - The ice or cold water dispenser in the fridge did not work. 
 - The media/tv room on the first floor was very dirty with stains on the couch and the blinds unable to be used due to being damaged. 
 - All floors were very dirty. There is a broom but no dustpan and brush to be able to sweep up the sand/dirt.
 - Although hand soap containers were in both bathrooms and kitchen, they were empty and we needed to buy soap for them. 
 - No dishwashing liquid was provided to be able to wash dishes. 
 - They do provide dishwasher tablets for the 1 drawer dishwasher. 
 - Not enough plates or cutlery for 10 adults.

We were very disappointed with the state of the property and felt that it was a long way from being value for money. We would not be able to recommend this property. It is way overpriced for how it presents presently.

column7: family house in the center of são sebastião
column11: Sendo que a casa nao tem microondas, no anicio falava que tinha maquina de lava e isso foi o principal pq estava viajando 23 dias com criança e quando cheguei nao tinha a maquina de lavar, difícil acesso pois a escada é super estreita ( eu calço 34) e meu pé não cabe nem de lado na escada super perigosa, tem ventilador de teto sendo que quando está muito quente o quarto fica super quente, a geladeira na parte de baixa não estava gelando bem ( falei com a dona Júlia e ela alegou que ninguém tinha reclamado da geladeira,só eu),falou para indireitar a tomada, em fim... não recomendo alugar quem tem criança de colo, idoso e pessoas com dificuldade de locomoção.
column13:
A casa fica bem localizada, perto de mercado, restaurante e do centro de São Sebastião.
 Sendo que a casa nao tem microondas, no anicio falava que tinha maquina de lava e isso foi o principal pq estava viajando 23 dias com criança e quando cheguei nao tinha a maquina de lavar, difícil acesso pois a escada é super estreita ( eu calço 34) e meu pé não cabe nem de lado na escada super perigosa, tem ventilador de teto sendo que quando está muito quente o quarto fica super quente, a geladeira na parte de baixa não estava gelando bem ( falei com a dona Júlia e ela alegou que ninguém tinha reclamado da geladeira,só eu),falou para indireitar a tomada, em fim... não recomendo alugar quem tem criança de colo, idoso e pessoas com dificuldade de locomoção.

column7: lovely condo just 1 mile from disney w/ resort pool, wifi & more
column10: friendly place, a bit dated and in need of some repairs
column11: Most concerning, some electrical outlets (Behind the master bed) were internally broken, loose and not fully functional.
column13:
The location, property layout and unit layout were all good. All as advertised. The property has dated and worn carpet, both showers, both shower fans, both bath faucets and vanities (vanity doors partially off the hinges in the master). Most concerning, some electrical outlets (Behind the master bed) were internally broken, loose and not fully functional. Seemed a bit hazardous. No ice trays, icemaker not functional, etc. 

Were charged an extra resort fee but the hot tub wasn't working.

column7: casa somerton - costablancadreams
column11: Vaatwasser was kapot en helaas niet meer te repareren.
column13: Heerlijke rustige locatie. Huis is perfect gelegen om te genieten van het winterzonnetje. Internet werkt perfect. Huisraad meer dan voldoende om maand te verblijven. Alles wel wat gedateerd. Vaatwasser was kapot en helaas niet meer te repareren. Verder wel fijn contact met beheerders

column7: custom ski in/out condo in purgatory lodge-best location
column11: When we arrived, there were past guest's supplies left in the fridge, one tv had been damaged prior to our stay, lights out and flickering in fridge and microwave, and dishwasher did not really clean the dishes.
column13:
Great location to the slopes and resort amenities. Spacious and accommodated everyone in our group. Host was very responsive and kind.

Be sure to bring toilet paper because there is a limited amount even though listing does not stipulate to bring more outside of 2 rolls per bathroom.

We cooked every meal but did not have any food storage options(Tupperware) for leftovers.

While this is a great location and very spacious, the king beds are very worn down and have big impressions in them which make it hard to get comfortable and sleep well.

When we arrived, there were past guest’s supplies left in the fridge, one tv had been damaged prior to our stay, lights out and flickering in fridge and microwave, and dishwasher did not really clean the dishes. There was a white film on all the dishes and they had to be washed prior to using.

Again, we had a wonderful time and it is a great location for a family ski trip, just a few considerations would have made it even better!

column7: bright and spacious villa with private pool, barbecue and wifi. good situation
column10: die location ist einer der besten in corralejo. ruhig, aber nah zum einkaufs/party-meile & strand.
column11: - Wanduhr in der Küche funktioniert nicht - Der Wasserkocher leckt Wasser - Lüfter im Badezimmer funktioniert nicht - Insektenschutz gab einmal, jetzt ist an allen Fenstern kaputt.
column13:
++ Internet schnell und relativ leicht einzurichten. Alle 5 Geräte konnten über WiFi verbunden werden und hatten gleichzeitig Zugang zum Internet.
++ Einchecken auch um 12:00 möglich. War positiv überrascht, wie schnell wir die Schlüssel bekommen haben.
++ In 10 Tagen 2 Mal Putzkolone.
+ Relativ nah an Strand. Man kann morgens mit den Surf-Nomaden hin und abends zurück
+ Beten sind stabil und sauber. Wir konnten ohne Rückenschmerzen gut schlafen.
+ Die große Elektrogeräte in der Küche sind relativ neu und funktionell
+ Es gibt tatsächlich 3 Schlafzimmer und keine der 6 Personen muss im Wohnzimmer auf dem Sofa schlafen. (Wie andere Inserate in diesem Region die Anzahl der Schlafplätze gerne übertrieben)
+ Das Haus ist Alarm gesichert.
o Der Tisch und die Stühle in der Küche sind viel neuer als die alte Einbauküchenelemente (IKEA machts möglich)
o Müllentsorgungskonzept relativ OK. Mann muss 100m zu Fuß zum Container (Glas, Plastik/Verpackung, Papier, Hausmüll)
o Küche ist mit Allem nötigen für 6 Personen ausgestattet
o Es gibt (wie im meisten Ferienhäuser) keine Garderobe im Flur oder in der Diele. Man hat aber reichlich Platz für Sofa und Sessel.
o Die Klopapierhalter sind magnetisch und schwergängig aber funktionieren. Bitte vorsichtig öffnen, weil jemand schon die Dübel aus der Wand gerissen hat.
- Die Kühlschranktür wurde mit Anschlag-Rechts montiert statt Links. Der Kühlschrank erlaubt eine Montage mir dem Türanschlag links und so wäre es auch viel einfacher gewesen etwas aus dem Kühlschrank zu holen und auf dem Tisch zu stellen.
- Tor funktioniert nicht. Man kann mit dem Auto nicht auf den Hof.
- Wanduhr in der Küche funktioniert nicht
- Der Wasserkocher leckt Wasser
- Lüfter im Badezimmer funktioniert nicht
- Insektenschutz gab einmal, jetzt ist an allen Fenstern kaputt.
- Die Fenster sind schwergängig und relativ verrostet.
-- Die Einbauküchenmöbel fehlt auseinander. Die Hängeschränke verlieren ihre Unterrahmen, die Laminierung der Fachböden und Seitenwände kommt ab, die Arbeitsplattenleiste hat sich von der Wand gelöst. 
--- Kakerlaken im Haus (~2cm groß). Nachdem ich unter der Eibauküchenschränke hinter Lippenleiste gründlich den jahrelangen Dreck geputzt habe und lebendige/tote Insekte entfernt habe, gab es keine weitere Begegnungen. Wir haben die Leiste, während unseres Aufenthalts nicht mehr angebracht damit sich keine Viecher sich einnisten können.

column7: oceanfront dog-friendly home with private beach access, amazing views, deck
column10: good location, needs to resolve some safety issues
column11: outlet behind bed missing electrical cover, safety hazard;
column13: 5 bedrooms, only 2 had tvs, neither worked, one working tv in whole house; light at outside stairway did not work, had to walk down steps in dark, safety hazard; outlet behind bed missing electrical cover, safety hazard; upper window in dining area came crashing down when unlocked, safety hazard; upstairs bedroom exterior door would not open, no egress from bedroom, safety hazard.

column13: A casa é muito boa e limpa. Muito espaçosa nas cozinhas, salão de jogos, áreas com grama. A única coisa que não funciona direito é a tv, mas não fez falta nenhuma. Voltaremos com certeza em outra oportunidade.

column13: Almost perfect! Spotless and well furnished. Unique neighborhood with lots of deer. Nice location just outside of the city. We used the fireplace to keep warm in the snow. Issues: can only reach owner via app, kitchen faucet is loose, 1 of 3 tv's not working. Thank you!
